snippet: For all that he's achieved in more than a decade as a professional tennis player, from the two Grand Slam titles to the No. 2 ranking, from an Olympic gold medal in singles to a Davis Cup championship, Andy Murray is about to do something he never...
lead_paragraph: For all that he's achieved in more than a decade as a professional tennis player, from the two Grand Slam titles to the No. 2 ranking, from an Olympic gold medal in singles to a Davis Cup championship, Andy Murray is about to do something he never has: face a fellow Brit at Wimbledon.

headline.print_headline: Wimbledon Lookahead: Murray to Face Fellow Brit for 1st Time
headline.main: Wimbledon Lookahead: Murray to Face Fellow Brit for 1st Time
